changelog:
## [vv0.1.90](releases/tag/vv0.1.90) - 2025-06-10
<!-- bump-type:patch -->
### New Features

- Custom chat ping functionality!!! To ping on any server type @ and on other web client such ping will be highlighted. Can be disabled. [`6a583d2`](/commit/6a583d2a363f04793265cc5afa1a766f2fd20724)
- Simple but effective renderer perf debug features ([#347](/issues/347))
- configurable mobile top buttons! ([#361](/issues/361))
### Bug Fixes

- **important**: make chat word breaking match Minecraftt behavior [`e982bf1`](/commit/e982bf1493207575e2e077a4843188083c10b794)
- **regression**: B on gamepad was opening pause menu instead of start (default actions map conflict). Now start if clicked again closes all modals [`38a1d83`](/commit/38a1d83cf284bf49d9eda0ed91c5bb62f35eded7)
